body_content.explanation: taken or done quickly when there is an opportunity between doing other things:
examples: Most of the research was done during snatched moments between exhausting shifts as a trainee hospital doctor.
Her meetings with local journalists were usually snatched conversations in car parks.

body_content.explanation: (of a person) very attractive, especially as a result of doing something to improve their appearance, for example, putting on make-up or exercising:
examples: I'd just got a spray tan and was looking snatched.
Everyone was saying that my make-up looked good and my face was snatched.
